content.text: I was honored to be able to donate blood in honor of my late sister.
Wow that's amazing! How did it feel?
It felt good to be able to help others and it made me feel closer to my sister.
Thanks! What's something interesting about you?
I've never been in a relationship, but I'm open to it if I find someone who shares my passion for dancing.
Oh wow! That's cool! I love dancing too! What kind of dancing do you like?
I like to do swing dancing and salsa dancing.
Oh that's awesome! I've always wanted to learn how to swing dance.
It's really fun! You should try it sometime.
Awesome! Maybe we could go swing dancing together sometime.
